ResearchProjectDef.label: Omni Gel
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build the MK1 Replicator, which can transform Omni-Gel into Slag or Rock.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mark 1 Replicator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build the MK1 Replicator, which can transform Omni-Gel into Slag or Rock.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mark 2 Replicator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build the MK2 Replicator, which can transform Omni-Gel into Metal or Silver.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mark 3 Replicator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build the MK3 Replicator, which can transform Omni-Gel into Uranium, Shells or Medicine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Molecular Reinforcement Compressor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Adds a Reinforced version of some Stuff. This allows for stronger constructions. Reinforced stuff has 10x the hitpoints but at 10x build time. Reinforced Stuff is made from 10 Normal Stuff in a Molecular Reinforcement Compressor. Currently Reinforced Stuff can be made from Steel, Plasteel, Wood, Stone, Silver, Gold, Uranium and Jade.
